actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The asanbosam makes one bite attack and one claws attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw against disease. If the saving throw fails, the target takes 11 (2d10) poison damage immediately and becomes poisoned until the disease is cured. Every 24 hours that elapse, the creature must repeat the saving throw and reduce its hit point maximum by 5 (1d10) on a failure. This reduction lasts until the disease is cured. The creature dies if the disease reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d10 + 4) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and the asanbosam can't claw a different target. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw against disease or contract the disease described in the bite attack.

special_abilities.name: Spider Climb
special_abilities.desc: The asanbosam can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

special_abilities.name: Arboreal
special_abilities.desc: While up in trees, the asanbosam can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (2d12 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Petrifying Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The gorgon exhales petrifying gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target begins to turn to stone and is restrained. The restrained target must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends on the target. On a failure, the target is petrified until freed by the greater restoration spell or other magic.

special_abilities.name: Trampling Charge
special_abilities.desc: If the gorgon moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the gorgon can make one attack with its hooves against it as a bonus action.

monsters.name: Lindwurm
monsters.senses: darkvision 60 ft., tremorsense 120 ft. on ice, passive Perception 14

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The lindwurm makes one bite attack, one claw attack, and one constrict attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or contract lindwurm fever.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (3d8 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the lindwurm can constrict only this target.

special_abilities.name: Lindwurm Fever
special_abilities.desc: A creature infected with this disease by a lindwurm's bite gains one level of exhaustion an hour after being infected. The creature must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw after each long rest. On a failure, the creature gains one level of exhaustion and recovers no hit dice from the long rest. On a success, the creature recovers from one level of exhaustion and regains hit dice normally. If the infected creature reduces itself to zero exhaustion by making successful saving throws, the disease is cured.

special_abilities.name: Skittering Skater
special_abilities.desc: Lindwurms suffer no penalties from difficult terrain on ice and are immune to the effects of the grease spell.

special_abilities.name: Snake Belly
special_abilities.desc: When lying with its sensitive stomach on the ice, a lindwurm can sense approaching creatures by the vibrations they cause, granting them tremorsense.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The owl harpy makes two claw attacks and two talon attacks.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Talons
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Hovering Darkness
actions.desc: An owl harpy that hovers in flight can shake a fine, magical dander from her wings over a creature within 20 feet and directly below her. The creature must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or fall unconscious and be poisoned for 10 minutes. It wakes up if it takes damage or if a creature uses an action to shake it awake, but waking up doesn't end the poisoning.

actions.name: Luring Song
actions.desc: The owl harpy sings a magical melody. Every humanoid and giant within 300 feet of the harpy that can hear the song must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed until the song ends. The harpy must use a bonus action on its subsequent turns to continue singing. It can stop singing at any time. The song ends if the harpy becomes incapacitated. While charmed by the harpy, a target is incapacitated and ignores the songs of other harpies. A charmed target that is more than 5 feet away from the harpy must move at its highest rate (including dashing, if necessary) along the most direct route to get within 5 feet of the harpy. The charmed creature doesn't maneuver to avoid opportunity attacks, but it can repeat the saving throw every time it takes damage from anything other than the harpy. It also repeats the saving throw before entering damaging terrain (lava or a pit, for example), if the most direct route includes a dangerous space. A creature also repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns. A successful saving throw ends the effect on that creature and makes the creature immune to this harpy's song for 24 hours.

special_abilities.name: Quiet Flight
special_abilities.desc: The owl harpy gains an additional +3 to Stealth (+9 in total) while flying.

special_abilities.name: Dissonance
special_abilities.desc: The owl harpy can't use its blindsight while deafened.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
the owl harpy's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. The owl harpy can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

3/day: darkness

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The ravenala makes two slam attacks or two bursting pod attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Bursting Pod
actions.desc: Melee Ranged Attack: +8 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and the target and all creatures within 5 feet of it also take 5 (2d4) piercing damage, or half as much piercing damage with a successful DC 15 Dexterity saving throw.

actions.name: Lamenting Engulfment
actions.desc: The ravenala targets a creature within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or be grappled and restrained by the ravenala. While restrained, the creature is engulfed inside the ravenala's trunk. The ravenala can grapple one creature at a time; grappling doesn't prevent it from using other attacks against different targets. The restrained creature must make a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw at the start of each of its turns. On a failure, the creature is compelled to sing a lament of all its various mistakes and misdeeds for as long as it remains restrained. Singing prevents uttering command words, casting spells with a verbal component, or any verbal communication. The restrained creature can still make melee attacks. When the ravenala moves, the restrained creature moves with it. A restrained creature can escape by using an action to make a DC 15 Strength check. On a success, the creature escapes and enters a space of its choice within 5 feet of the ravenala.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The ravenala has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
the ravenala's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 14). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

at will: entangle, sleep

1/day each: heal, wall of thorns

special_abilities.name: Green Walk
special_abilities.desc: The ravenala can move across undergrowth, natural or magical, without needing to make an ability check and without expending additional movement.

actions.name: Ghost Wings
actions.desc: The ravenfolk doom croaker furiously "beats"a set of phantasmal wings. Every creature within 5 feet of the ravenfolk must make a successful DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or be blinded until the start of the ravenfolk's next turn.

actions.name: Radiant Runestaff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage plus 4 (1d8) radiant damage.

special_abilities.name: Mimicry
special_abilities.desc: Ravenfolk doom croakers can mimic the voices of others with uncanny accuracy. They have advantage on Charisma (Deception) checks involving audible mimicry.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The doom croaker has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
the doom croaker's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 15). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

at will: comprehend languages

3/day each: counterspell, fear, phantom steed

1/day each: blight, call lightning, clairvoyance, insect plague

1/week: legend lore

monsters.name: Shambling Mound
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 10

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The shambling mound makes two slam attacks. If both attacks hit a Medium or smaller target, the target is grappled (escape DC 14), and the shambling mound uses its Engulf on it.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Engulf
actions.desc: The shambling mound engulfs a Medium or smaller creature grappled by it. The engulfed target is blinded, restrained, and unable to breathe, and it must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw at the start of each of the mound's turns or take 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the mound moves, the engulfed target moves with it. The mound can have only one creature engulfed at a time.

special_abilities.name: Lightning Absorption
special_abilities.desc: Whenever the shambling mound is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The troll makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: The troll has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

special_abilities.name: Regeneration
special_abilities.desc: The troll regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

special_abilities.name: Variant: Loathsome Limbs
special_abilities.desc:
Whenever the troll takes at least 15 slashing damage at one time, roll a d20 to determine what else happens to it:

**1-10:** Nothing else happens.
**11-14:** One leg is severed from the troll if it has any legs left.
**15- 18:** One arm is severed from the troll if it has any arms left.
**19-20:** The troll is decapitated, but the troll dies only if it can't regenerate. If it dies, so does the severed head.

If the troll finishes a short or long rest without reattaching a severed limb or head, the part regrows. At that point, the severed part dies. Until then, a severed part acts on the troll's initiative and has its own action and movement. A severed part has AC 13, 10 hit points, and the troll's Regeneration trait.
A **severed leg** is unable to attack and has a speed of 5 feet.
A **severed arm** has a speed of 5 feet and can make one claw attack on its turn, with disadvantage on the attack roll unless the troll can see the arm and its target. Each time the troll loses an arm, it loses a claw attack.
If its head is severed, the troll loses its bite attack and its body is blinded unless the head can see it. The **severed head** has a speed of 0 feet and the troll's Keen Smell trait. It can make a bite attack but only against a target in its space.
The troll's speed is halved if it's missing a leg. If it loses both legs, it falls prone. If it has both arms, it can crawl. With only one arm, it can still crawl, but its speed is halved. With no arms or legs, its speed is 0, and it can't benefit from bonuses to speed.

monsters.name: Unicorn

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The unicorn makes two attacks: one with its hooves and one with its horn.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Horn
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Healing Touch (3/Day)
actions.desc: The unicorn touches another creature with its horn. The target magically regains 11 (2d8 + 2) hit points. In addition, the touch removes all diseases and neutralizes all poisons afflicting the target.

actions.name: Teleport (1/Day)
actions.desc: The unicorn magically teleports itself and up to three willing creatures it can see within 5 ft. of it, along with any equipment they are wearing or carrying, to a location the unicorn is familiar with, up to 1 mile away.

monsters.legendary_desc: The unicorn can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The unicorn regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: Hooves
legendary_actions.desc: The unicorn makes one attack with its hooves.

legendary_actions.name: Shimmering Shield (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The unicorn creates a shimmering, magical field around itself or another creature it can see within 60 ft. of it. The target gains a +2 bonus to AC until the end of the unicorn's next turn.

legendary_actions.name: Heal Self (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The unicorn magically regains 11 (2d8 + 2) hit points.

special_abilities.name: Charge
special_abilities.desc: If the unicorn moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a horn attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
The unicorn's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14). The unicorn can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

At will: detect evil and good, druidcraft, pass without trace
1/day each: calm emotions, dispel evil and good, entangle

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The unicorn has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Magic Weapons
special_abilities.desc: The unicorn's weapon attacks are magical.

monsters.name: Vila
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: A vila makes two shortsword attacks or two shortbow attacks.

actions.name: +1 Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d6 + 6) piercing damage.

actions.name: +1 Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d6 + 6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Fascinate (1/Day)
actions.desc: When the vila sings, all those within 60 feet of her and who can hear her must make a successful DC 14 Charisma saving throw or be stunned for 1d4 rounds. Those who succeed on the saving throw are immune to that vila's singing for 24 hours.

actions.name: Forest Song (1/Day)
actions.desc: The vila magically calls 2d6 wolves or 2 wampus cats. The called creatures arrive in 1d4 rounds, acting as allies of the vila and obeying its spoken commands. The beasts remain for 1 hour, until the vila dies, or until the vila dismisses them as a bonus action.

special_abilities.name: Dance of the Luckless (1/Day)
special_abilities.desc: Vila who dance for one hour create a fairy ring of small gray mushrooms. The ring lasts seven days and has a 50-foot diameter per dancing vila. Non-vila who fall asleep (including magical sleep) inside the ring have disadvantage on skill checks for 24 hours from the time they awaken.

special_abilities.name: Forest Quickness
special_abilities.desc: While in forest surroundings, a vila receives a +4 bonus on initiative checks.

special_abilities.name: Forest Meld
special_abilities.desc: A vila can meld into any tree in her forest for as long as she wishes, similar to the meld into stone spell.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
the vila's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

3/day: sleep

1/week: control weather

monsters.name: Werebear
monsters.armor_desc: 10 in humanoid form, 11 (natural armor) in bear and hybrid form

speed.notes: 40 ft., climb 30 ft. in bear or hybrid form

monsters.damage_immunities: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: In bear form, the werebear makes two claw attacks. In humanoid form, it makes two greataxe attacks. In hybrid form, it can attack like a bear or a humanoid.

actions.name: Bite (Bear or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with were bear lycanthropy.

actions.name: Claw (Bear or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Greataxe (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Shapechanger
special_abilities.desc: The werebear can use its action to polymorph into a Large bear-humanoid hybrid or into a Large bear, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its size and AC, are the same in each form. Any equipment it. is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: The werebear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The zmey headline makes one bite attack and one claws attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d12 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The zmey headling exhales fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area takes 16 (3d10) fire damage, or half damage with a successful DC 16 Dexterity saving throw.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The zmey headling can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Regeneration
special_abilities.desc: The zmey headling reaver regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. This trait doesn't function if the zmey headling took acid or fire damage since the end of its previous turn. It dies if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.
